Key: I wonder how Yoshino's doing.

Yoshino is alone more often than not.
Even if Yoshinon is with her, I need to look after her.
What is it, Shin?
Oh, Reine-san. Where are you right now?
Oh. I'm in your room, actually, but...
Huh?

Well, I've been imposing. I thought I'd show
my appreciation by cleaning a little.
Oh, you really don't need to clean, it's okay...
Don't even worry about it. Oh, and Shin?
Yes?

That thing you were hiding...
I'll pretend I never saw it, okay?

Huh?! What thing?!
Come on, you can't just say that!
Hm? Oh, right. My apologies...

You don't need to apologize, but please...
just give me a break.

By the way Shin, didn't you contact me
for something important?
Oh... right.

Okay, so if you're at my house...
then Yoshino's nearby, right?

I was wondering how Yoshino is doing.
Could you possibly take her to school and... huh?

(Saying it made me realize, but Reine-san...
she's a teacher at my school. Why is she
already at my house?)
Ah. Well, it's a piece of cake with the Fraxinus.
Can you please stop reading peoples' minds?!

Well... okay, I understand.
But why the school of all places?
You could come home first then leave somewhere.

I thought maybe Yoshino would be
happy if we met outside somewhere... you know?

I see. I could see it as you trying to make
things easier for yourself, but...

Huh? No, no, no! It's not that at all!
So, where's Yoshino?
Ah, I believe she's somewhere in the house.
Oh, so she's not right there with you.
No, but she was helping me clean until a moment ago.

But when she spotted... the item...
she scurried off like a scared little mouse...

What?! That's...
What have you done?!

Anyway, I'll bring her over right away.
But, it'll be a different story if Yoshino
says she doesn't even want to see your face.

Ha... yeah...
Wait, this isn't something to laugh about!
In any case, please wait there.
(They're late. Could it be... they're not coming?)

(Reine-san did say she saw that item under the bed.
Even if she's a spirit who's not well versed with
society, it'd be a shock to any girl.)

I wonder if Yoshino's started to hate me.
She wouldn't be coming anymore today if...
And if... that were to happen, I...
Hey, Shido-san...

H-Hey, sorry for calling you
out here like this.
N-No, it's no trouble... I'm glad.
Oh, good. You two were able to find each other.
Reine-san... I thought you were going to be here, too.

It'd be a little nonsensical for a guardian
to come along on a date, wouldn't it?
Well, I guess so...

Okay, so before your date gets started, I think
you'll need to clear the air in regards to...
well, you know what.

Right. Reine-san, how much did Yoshino
actually see?

Hm. Well, she ran away as soon as I started
flipping through it, so I can't imagine
she saw it very thoroughly.

D-Do you think, I could just pretend that
it didn't happen?

Who knows, I believe that's up to Yoshino.
Listen, make sure you're careful not to worsen
a spirit's mood.
Come on... at least give me some advice.

The Fraxinus' AI is acting up... it won't
display any choices. So it seems... all
I can do is watch over you two.
Isn't that just peeping at this point then?!
Alright then, I'll leave Yoshino to you.
W-What should I do?
I should just come clean and tell the truth.
I'm a guy... it's normal. I'll just pretend I didn't know.
U-Um... I'm glad that you came, Yoshino.
Huh?
Er, well... you saw it, right? In my room...

Huh?! U-Um... I-I'm sorry!
I didn't mean... to see it, but...

No, no, no... don't apologize, Yoshino!
In fact, I should be the one apologizing!

Yoohoo! It's quite manly of you to apologize!
But having this part of your manliness
exposed is quite the blunder of a lifetime!

O-Oogh...
Yoshinon... you...

Well, Shido-kun... you are a guy.
I guess it's par for the course.
I-Is that so?
That's right. Yoshino's not angry or anything like that～.
Huh, really?

Yup, yup. Yoshino is a kind girl who could fill
an ocean with the love in her heart. She'll
never be mad at a guy for something like this.
Thank goodness.
Okay then... let's get going, Yoshino.
Um... ahem...
What is it, Yoshinon?
Shido-kun, don't you have something to say?

Ah, u-ummmm...
What are you talking about?

Oh, trying to pretend it away huh?!
Bad idea considering we definitely saw it!
Ah, no... that's, um...

Well, you're a guy so there isn't much
we can do about that... but it's just tasteless
to pretend like we didn't see it.

Ah, okay, okay! I get it!
Yoshino, I'm sorry.

U-Um... I-I'm so sorry too!
 I didn't mean... to see it, but...

Yoshino's an understanding young lady.
All you had to do was apologize, Shido-kun,
and she'd definitely return the favor.
Thank goodness.

You took a little longer to get here today,
right? I thought you might've been upset...

That's silly. She simply got a little caught up
getting ready to come see you. Right, Yoshino?
R-Really?
Yes...
Come on, Shido-kun, didn't you notice?
Hm?

Yoshino's dressed to the nines today.
She's going on a date with you, after all!
What?!

(N-Now that he mentions it, today Yoshino's hair is slightly
more silken and fluffy. I think it smells nice too...)
I-I actually... wanted to get ready faster, but...
I helped too! It took forever...

Do you think it took longer because one
of your hands has to hold Yoshinon?
Shido-kun, are you calling me the bad guy?
You did nothing wrong, Yoshinon!

Oh, no, nothing like that... I'm sorry.
Forget I said anything. Alright, let's
get going...
Okay, where to go for our date?

Yoshino, are there any places you'd like
to go in particular?
Huh? Um... um...
Hmm?
Ummm......

Don't stress yourself out thinking about it.
Why don't we go to the shopping district?
Oh... y-yes!

Okay, here we are: the shopping district.
Now what should we do?
Hm? What's the matter?
U-Um...
Yoshino wants to go look at that store.

That store? Really? But that's an electronics store...
Do you want to look at the appliances or something?
Y-yes, I would... um... is that not alright with you?
Oh, no, it's perfectly fine. Let's go check it out.
Okay!
Wow...

This floor sells cooking appliances and stuff like
that. Doesn't seem too exciting, huh?

Shido-san... you use these appliances
to make food, right?

Yes. The ones they're selling are just like
the ones that I use at home.
It's... amazing.
Ah, really? I mean, it's kind of ordinary to me...
Um... what is... this?

This is a rice cooker. You can steam rice with it.
It's a nicer one than what we have at home,
so it probably cooks much more delicious rice.
Even... more delicious?
Yeah... but it's not an easy thing to buy...
I... I see...

W-What about this?
What is... this over here?

Oh, that's a wok. It'd feel really authentic if you made fried
rice with it. Well, it's too big for our stove back home, but...

I... see. T-Then...
What about this?

(There are so many things she doesn't get a chance
to see up close. She must be having a blast with this.
I'm just glad she seems to be enjoying herself.

Oh, Yoshino, you're getting so carried away!
Watch your step, okay? Don't break anything!
Oh, right... I-I'm sorry.

No, no, you're doing fine.
I'm just glad you're having fun.
T-Thank you!
I know, why don't you buy something, Yoshino?
Huh?
You're curious, aren't you?
U-Um...
Hi, do you need help with something?
Ah?!
U-Um... well, um...
Gooo, Yoshino! You're fine! Yoshinon is with you!
Y-Yeah!
You can do it, Yoshino!
Right...
Hit 'em where it hurts!
I'll... I'll beat them up!
(That's probably not the best idea...)
...U-Umm.
Yes? How can I help you?
Well, she, uh... tried.
Hm? What's wrong?
Nothing's the matter! Sorry to trouble you.

Hey, are you okay?
Let's go outside and get some fresh air.
O-Okay...
Feel better?
Yes... I'm sorry.
Don't even sweat it, Yoshino.

Yeah, you tried your best.
There's nothing to apologize about.
What were you trying to say to the clerk?
Ah... um...

Well, I wanted to know... what kind of appliances
I need... to make more delicious meals...
Why?
So that... everyone can smile... and be happy!
Oh, really?
Y-Yes!
I can't help but feel a little embarrassed...
Yoshinon loves Shido-kun's cooking, too!
Thanks. Wait... Yoshinon, you can't eat... right?
Hm... or can I...?
A-Anyway, it was just... I couldn't do it!

Ah, it's okay. You don't need to beat
yourself up for that, you know.

Hey, Yoshino... if there was any dish in the world
you could eat, what would it be?
Huh?
Just think... what kind of flavors do you like?
Yoshinon wants something fluffy and sweet!
Ah... I-I'd like that, too...

I see. Maybe sweet potato then?
How about... daigaku imo?
Daigaku... imo?
Yeah! It's sweet and fluffy.
I knew you'd think of the perfect dish!

If I recall, using an anhydrous pot
makes it better. Then, since we're
here, I'll buy one.
A-Anhydrous pot? W-What is that?
It's an appliance that makes food more delicious.
Ah!

You may not have been able to talk
to the clerk, but I think we're on the
same page about food, Yoshino.

I'm gonna make some daigaku imo
for both you and Yoshinon!
T-Thank you, so much!
Good job, Yoshino!
Yeah...
Here we go...
It's not heavy, is it?
It's... no, this is fine... whoa!
I can help too!
No, it's okay...
Well, just tell me if you need help!
Sure thing. Thanks.
Of course!
You seem really happy...
Hm? I do?
Yes.
You're just excited to eat daigaku imo, right?!
That's just the motivation I need to make them.
Y-Yes... it's true.
You're really looking forward to it, huh? I'm glad.
Ah!
Hey, Yoshino... are you busy tonight?
Tonight?

Yeah, we're all going to the lake tonight.
We're giving an offering to the Tengu Cow.
Tengu Cow?

The guardian deity of Tengu City, apparently.
Offerings have been lacking lately and we all
said we'd go. It'll definitely test our courage...
Do you want to come with us?
Will it be... scary?

Uh... well, it is at night... and in a deserted place.
It might be a little scary. You don't have to
come, so don't feel like you have to, if...
I'll come!
Huh?! Really?

Yes! It might be a little scary, but if
everyone is going too then I'll be okay.
Woohoo! That's the stuff, Yoshino!
Great!
This'll be the perfect midnight rendezvous!\nYou might get lucky, Yoshino... do your best!

Yoshinon, that sounds a little suggestive...
okay, Yoshino, I'll see you tonight.
Okay! I'll do my best out there.
